Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Category: COSMETIC AND MEDICAL EQUIPMENT AND IMPLEMENTS
Name: Vase for cosmetics
Description: Small container with a high shoulder, small neck, thick lip and flat base. Vases of this type, which are classified as cosmetic implements, contained perfume, makeup or unguent.
